backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, incidents, evidence, stalker profiles, police departments, and settings with authorization checks and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON feature manifest describing landing‑page text updates and associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend components and workflow pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes with shared CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with the site title set to Time4jail.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that manages authentication state, user profile setup flow, and switches between HomePage and AuthenticatedApp.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to enter and save their name using a profile‑save mutation.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, navigation, settings dialog, and logout handling for authenticated views.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: A settings dialog that loads user settings, allows selecting theme, tone, and language, and saves updates via backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, incidents, evidence, stalker profiles, and settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and multiple color themes, including default, dark, and womenSafety themes using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, initializes QueryClient, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AuthenticatedApp.tsx: Main authenticated UI with tab navigation, applying user-selected theme and rendering workflow pages based on active tab.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero messaging, authentication via Internet Identity, and conditional UI based on login state.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/EvidenceReco: Drawer sheet displaying a single evidence file with metadata, preview rendering, and download access.
Page for uploading new evidence, listing existing evidence, linking items to incidents, and viewing details in a drawer.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentDeta: Drawer showing incident details including report number, status, description, and linked evidence count.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsPag: Incident management page for creating, filtering, viewing, and summarizing reported incidents.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/IncidentsSum: Dialog summarizing all incidents with copy and download options.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/InstallGuide: Provides PWA install instructions for iOS, Android, and desktop, plus a short explanation of benefits.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/MessageGener: Generates customizable cease‑and‑desist messages based on tone and optional incident data with options to copy or send via SMS.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/PoliceDepart: Allows users to search for, view, and save police department contact info, including a Google search helper and manual entry form.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/ResourcesPag: Displays a set of national crime‑help hotlines and resource links, plus an emergency section advising users to call 911.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/StalkerProfi: Lets users create and manage profiles documenting individuals involved in stalking, including descriptions and notes.
frontend/src/pages/workflow/VictimSurviv: React page that loads, edits, saves, and clears victim/survivor personal info using form fields and backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/utils/datetime.ts: Utility functions to format bigint timestamps into display strings, input-friendly dates, and short dates.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Creates and triggers download of a text file via a Blob and temporary link.
frontend/src/utils/files.ts: Provides file-size validation and converts File objects to Uint8Array using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/googleSearch.ts: Opens a Google search in a new tab using combined and encoded city, state, and query terms.
frontend/src/utils/incidentSummary.ts: Generates a multi-section text summary of incidents, including timeline details and basic keyword pattern analysis.
frontend/src/utils/incidentText.ts: Formats a single incident into a short reference string with title and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/messageGenerator.ts: Generates cease‑and‑desist style messages in various tones, optionally including an incident reference.
frontend/src/utils/smsLink.ts: Builds an SMS deep-link URL with encoded message and optional phone number, warning on long messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL or hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current version, expanded scope into a women’s‑safety incident documentation app, architectural notes for personalization, evidence handling, SMS and police lookup, PWA support, and tracked existing features. Contains no known issues and is not a fix request.
